natural_disasters.title: Earthquake
natural_disasters.description: Mitigation strategies for earthquakes focus on reducing structural damage and improving preparedness in earthquake-prone areas.

natural_disasters.title: Flood
natural_disasters.description: Flood mitigation aims to prevent or reduce the impact of floods on communities through infrastructure and early warning systems.

natural_disasters.title: Hurricane/Typhoon
natural_disasters.description: Hurricane mitigation involves preparedness measures to reduce damage caused by high winds and storm surges in coastal areas.

natural_disasters.title: Drought
natural_disasters.description: Drought mitigation focuses on conserving water and promoting sustainable agricultural practices in regions prone to water scarcity.

natural_disasters.title: Wildfire
natural_disasters.description: Wildfire mitigation strategies aim to reduce the risk of fires through land management, public awareness, and rapid response systems.

natural_disasters.title: Tsunami
natural_disasters.description: Tsunami mitigation involves creating coastal defenses, evacuation plans, and early warning systems to minimize loss of life.

natural_disasters.title: Volcanic Eruption
natural_disasters.description: Volcanic eruption mitigation focuses on monitoring active volcanoes, creating hazard maps, and developing evacuation plans.

natural_disasters.title: Landslide
natural_disasters.description: Landslide mitigation strategies aim to reduce slope instability and minimize the risk of damage in landslide-prone areas.
